title: Update Real-Time Arrival Information
description: A bus is delayed due to unexpected traffic. A control center agent must update the real-time passenger information systems.

tasks.description: Receive an automated alert that a specific bus is running 15 minutes behind schedule.
Update the estimated time of arrival (ETA) for all subsequent stops on the bus's route.
tasks.expected_outcome: The system recalculates and pushes updated ETAs to station signs and the mobile app.

tasks.description: Post a general service alert message explaining the delay (e.g., 'Route 5 experiencing delays due to heavy traffic').
tasks.expected_outcome: A public-facing alert is successfully published.
